intro: I am serving as an Professor in the Institute of Appropriate Technology at Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology. I completed my PhD from the Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Rutgers University, New Jersey in 2020. I earned both my M.Sc. degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering in 2012, and B.Sc. degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering in 2009 from Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology. My research works lie at the intersection of Signal Processing, Machine Learning, Wireless Communication and Internet of Things (IoT). My goal is to establish an independent research career in Bangladesh with multidisciplinary collaborations in the field of healthcare IoT system leveraging the advance AI technologies. I am a member of IEEE, Society of Women Engineering (SWE-USA), and ACM.
researchInterests: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Neural Network, Internet of Things (IoT), AI Based Healthcare, Localization and Tracking, Smart Home Systems, Speech Processing
news: Our paper on AI Based Healthcare Decision Support got accepted in TENSYMP 2022, Mumbai, India
Appointed as AI Program Committee Member at Virtual GHC 2021, USA
Appointed as Secretary, IEEE SPS Bangladesh Chapter 2021, 2022
Served as the Central Committee Member of International Robot Olympiad, 2021
thankYou: Thank you for visiting my website.
